borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Installation of a rooflight on top of the flat roof, removal and bricking up of an existing small window and concrete lintel with matching re-claimed stock brickwork, installation of a new enlarged double glazed obscure timber window with a brick arch following the removal of an existing window and concrete lintel to the side elevation of first floor back addition; internal alterations at first floor level to include, removal of existing dividing stud wall between the bathroom and wc unit in connection with the creation of a new bathroom with a wc unit, sanitary ware and a closet, alterations to the wall between the passage and bathroom to include repositioning of an existing door, and replacement of redundant wc single door with a new double door, internal alterations at ground floor level to include, re-location of the kitchen units to the outer part of the garden room and reinstatement of the original chimney breast in the kitchen with a new fireplace opening and flue connection to the existing chimney above, removal of the existing shelving unit set into doorway in the sitting room and associated internal and external alterations.
